svg.text: This model controls the display case outside 337 Cory Hall in Berkeley. It responds to commands to turn on or off the activity in the case. When the activity is on, it responds to motion sensed by the motion detector and executes Ptolemy demos.
Authors: Colin Cochran and Edward A. Lee
This controller uses three transition refinements to turn off the lights, to highlight the center, or to highlight the sides. The running state has a refinement that executes a sequence of demos.

property.name: Director
property.doc: Simple director that executes actors in the order in which they were created.
